text: Gediminas Kirkilas (; 30 August 1951 – 20 April 2024) was a Lithuanian politician who was Prime Minister of Lithuania from 2006 to 2008. Kirkilas died on 20 April 2024 in Vilnius, Lithuania at the age of 72.Mirė politikas, buvęs Lietuvos premjeras Gediminas Kirkilas ==References== Category:1951 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Prime ministers of Lithuania Category:Politicians from Vilnius
title: Gediminas Kirkilas
